H0.text: What is the highest possible score in a game of ten pin bowling. 270 points

H1.text: What is the highest possible score in a game of ten pin bowling. 200 points

H2.text: What is the highest possible score in a game of ten pin bowling. 420 points

H3.text: What is the highest possible score in a game of ten pin bowling. 300 points

A4.text: The maximum score is 300, achieved by getting twelve strikes in a row within the same game (known as a perfect game).

A5.text: The maximum score is 300, achieved with ten consecutive strikes (as opposed to twelve in traditional scoring), but with no bonus pins received in the tenth frame.
